video.title: Autumn's Concerto
video.synopsis: After losing all memories of his past, a wealthy lawyer travels to a rural village where a woman he once loved now lives with her son.

episodes.synopsis: After her dad dies in an accident and creditors repossess all their belongings, Mucheng and her stepmother are left stranded. Then she meets Guangxi.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: When Mucheng discovers that Guangxi is only going out with her to fulfill a bet, she shows him just how strong she can be -- which makes him furious.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Guangxi hides an incriminating photograph to protect Mucheng's reputation. Then Guangxi's spoiled ex-girlfriend arrives to stir up some trouble!
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: After getting news that that Guangxi is injured, Mucheng rushes to Shengde Hall. But it turns out to be a trap by Zhang Aili and her friends.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: After Guangxi manages to stop Uncle Ah Cai from molesting Mucheng, Xiao Er Yi doesn't believe Mucheng's accusations and kicks her out of the house.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: The surveillance camera evidence has gone missing, leaving Guangxi with only Xiao Er Yi as his witness. But is she willing to help Mucheng?
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: After suffering one defeat after another in trying to prove Mucheng's innocence, Guangxi confesses his feelings for her in front of everyone.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Despite his intense love for Mucheng, Guangxi tries to distance himself from her in order to hide his serious medical condition.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: As Guangxi's operation draws near, his mother makes an arrangement with President He to provide Guangxi with the most advanced medical care available.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: The operation takes an unexpected turn when Uncle Er Cai shows up to take advantage of Guangxi's vulnerable condition. In the future, much changes.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Guangxi has grown up to be a successful lawyer. He has grown to love Yiqian, who has stayed by his side ever since his operation.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Guangxi is sentenced to community service in the village of Huatian, where he witnesses Boss Hua bullying a woman and her child.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: After a wild welcoming party for Guangxi, Xiaole takes him home. Mucheng can't believe that the man she hurt six years ago is now in front of her!
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: As Mucheng prepares herself to face Guangxi, she learns that he lost all memory of their time together, and she tries to keep her distance from him.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Xiaole asks Guangxi to attend family day at his school, but is disappointed when Guangxi declines. Mucheng pleads with Guangxi to help the village.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Tang Tang shows up to ask Guangxi to come for family day. He attends, despite rejecting Xiao Le's request before.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Guangxi reconsiders his purpose in the village and decides to go against President He's order to help Hua Tian Village.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Mucheng is speechless when asked if she still loves Guangxi. When she and Guangxi are at the university, the familiar surroundings trigger his memory.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: After Guangxi has flashbacks of his past at Shengde Hall, he and Mucheng return to the village in time to expose the truth about the pollution.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: While the villagers celebrate their courtroom victory, Guangxi talks with Auntie Hua and tries to discover more about Mucheng's past.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Yiqian asks Mucheng why she left Guangxi under such horrible circumstances six years ago, but Mucheng chooses to keep the truth to herself.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Xiaole misses Guangxi, so he goes looking for him alone. Fearful that Mucheng's secret will derail the wedding, Guangxi's mom pushes the date forward.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: The tension between Mucheng and Guangxi becomes explosive as the number of secrets about their shared past continue to grow.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: After regaining his memory of being abandoned by Mucheng, Guangxi is filled with contempt -- and wants to take his son away from her.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Hua's shop is under investigation for selling liquor, and Tuoye is taken to the police. But it turns out that it is all a part of Guangxi's plan.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: After moving into Guangxi's house with Xiaole, Mucheng is fearful as she faces Fang Derong's discrimination and Guangxi's erratic behavior.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: The sexual assault case that reflected negatively on Guangxi's career brings him closer to Mucheng, despite their misunderstandings.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: After learning that Wu Lihua disappeared from the hospital, Mucheng heads to Li Wangcai's house, knowing that she would look for him.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Hua needs money to save Tuoye and calls Mucheng for help. Mucheng joins Guangxi on a business trip, but soon learns the client is Zhang Aili.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Zhang Aili is planning to use her divorce case as a way to seduce Guangxi. While on a field trip with Guangxi's mother, Xiaole is accused of stealing.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Guangxi gives Mucheng a chance to explain herself, but she is interrupted by a call from Bingzai about Tuoye's desperate situation.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: In jail, Tuoye pleads guilty but refuses to reveal any details. When Guangxi questions Chixin about the murder, he realizes Chixin's mental disorder.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: With an aggressive prosecutor and a lack of evidence, defending Tuoye is proving to be a challenge. Guangxi learns the truth about his father's death.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Just when Guangxi makes up his mind to let Mucheng go her own way, fate brings them back together once again when their son is kidnapped.
episodes.title: Episode 34
